name: Bear71VR_OpenSource
description: A demo of the sprite map technique from Bear 71 VR

scripts.start: budo index.js:bundle.js -d app --live -- -s Bear71VR_OpenSource -t babelify -t glslify
scripts.start:ssl: budo index.js:bundle.js -d app --ssl --live -- -s Bear71VR_OpenSource -t babelify -t glslify
scripts.build-debug: browserify index.js -s Bear71VR_OpenSource -d -t babelify -t glslify > app/bundle.js
scripts.build: browserify index.js -s Bear71VR_OpenSource -t babelify -t glslify | uglifyjs -m -c warnings=false > app/bundle.js
